feedback: Love the new dashboard! It's so much easier to navigate now.
The app crashes whenever I try to export data. This is really frustrating.
Pricing seems a bit high compared to competitors. Would love to see a discount for annual plans.
The mobile app needs better offline support. I travel a lot and need to work without internet.
Great customer service! The support team responded within minutes.
The UI is confusing. I can't find the settings menu.
Performance has improved significantly since the last update. Great work!
Need more integration options. Would love to connect with Slack and Teams.
The onboarding process was smooth and intuitive.
Bugs in the reporting feature. Charts don't display correctly.
